thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Polish rates my be left unchanged or hiked by mid-2019 -c.bank governor

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Polish rates my be left unchanged or hiked by mid-2019 -c.bank governor
text:
WARSAW, Jan 29 (Reuters) - Polish central bank governor Adam Glapinski was Quote: d as saying on Monday that he would not be surprised if interest rates, presently at 1.5 percent, are raised by mid-2019 or would stay unchanged.
“I would not be surprised if even until mid-2019 interest rates would stay at present level, similarly I would not be surprised if it would be necessary to hike them,” Glapinski told Dziennik Gazeta Prawna daily in an excerpt from an interview that is to be released on Tuesday. (Reporting by Pawel Florkiewicz and Marcin Goclowski)
